title: Elephant In The Room: The Surprising Science of Elephant Trunks
description:
Who is Mindy's secret guest at her Gingerbread Mansion? Oh, just a 7,000 pound African Elephant that escaped from the zoo! Join Mindy, Guy Raz, Dennis, and Evie the Elephant in the Laboratory of Bad Ideas as they discover the multi-talents of the elephant trunk! It's the who, what, when, why, how, and WOW of elephant trunks!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
